title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 412 - Reporting Information For Inspections
content:

State Regulations
§ 412.1 - Facility-supplied information required
§ 412.2 - Certification by operator or administrator
§ 412.3 - Inspection

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. A, art. 3, pt. 412

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
